title: I can't connect to chat, but I can still game?
body:
Since the latest update (Boss battle update), I've been experiencing issues connecting with social services. Aka, since the latest patch, I haven't been able to connect with chat services at ALL. I can still search for games and invite friends on my friend's list via the search feature in the invite tab, but it's very annoying not being able to see any friends online or communicate before/after games.

 Is anyone else experiencing this bug? If so, how did you solve it? (I have windows 7 if that helps at all). Thanks for your responses!

replies.body: Some players have been having issues with chat connection lately, but most have been able to get this sorted out by adjusting a couple network settings. Let's first make sure that your port forwarding has Port 5223 open, and let me know if that helps!

Hey, Broporo!

I have looked at my port forwarding and I can confirm that port 5223 is open. I followed the video guide riot has and it has not helped. Anything else you think would work?

~Thanks!

Well snap. Let's get you a little more specialized help from our tech guys so that they can look into this and hopefully get your chat working again. Reach out to them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help soon ^_^!

Hey, Broporo!

I honestly have no idea what changed from when I tried it yesterday to today, but it totally works. Thanks for the help!

I added port 5223 to the port forwarding list and that didn't work, still shows disconnected from chat for the game launcher. Ingame chat works just fine.

I will try to add ports 5222 and 2099 next

Edit: 5222 and 2099 had no effect either

Edit 2: Now it's working! Maybe one of the ports was it and the port forward rule hadn't taken effect yet.
